  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    HeroAppearanceComponent
    Handles hero appearance upgrades (supports both RotatingTextureRenderComponent / TextureRenderComponent).
    HeroClickableComponent
    Hero clickable component - currently disabled.
    HeroCustomizationComponent
     
    HeroOneShotFormSwitchComponent
    Hero form switcher: - Boot to form-1 immediately (texture + bullet + params) once hero is available.
    HeroPlacementComponent
     
    HeroSelectionComponent
    After entering the level, the corresponding hero placement device will be automatically installed according to the main menu selection.
    HeroTurretAttackComponent
    Turret-style attack component for the hero: fires bullets toward the mouse cursor on cooldown, rotates to face aim direction, and computes damage from CombatStatsComponent at fire time.
    HeroUltimateComponent
    Hero ultimate ability component: - Triggered via button press or event.
    HeroUpgradeComponent
    Hero upgrade component: - Triggered by pressing Enter / Numpad Enter, or via an event.
